traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.text: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute.

actions.name: Acid Breath
actions.text: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.text: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.text: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.text: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.text: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

actions.name: Touch
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage, and the target catches fire.

name: Skeleton
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 12 (4d6) piercing damage, or 6 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 13).

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Blood Frenzy (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The vampire spawn makes one bite attack against a creature it has grappled.
